name: etouq
description:
Etouq is a Chrome extension that delivers daily quotes to inspire and uplift your day. With a wide range of categories including Friendship, Motivational, Funny, Sad, and Peace, you can find the perfect quote to suit your mood or share with friends. Each day brings a new quote, handpicked to bring positivity to your browsing experience. 

 Data Usage: Etouq utilizes local storage to store your daily quote preferences, ensuring that you receive a fresh quote every day without the need for additional permissions or data access. Your browsing experience remains private and secure, with no personal data collected or shared.
